original_text: Or what king, going out to encounter another king in war, will not sit down first and deliberate whether he is able with ten thousand to meet him who comes against him with twenty thousand?
korean_text: 또 어떤 임금이 다른 임금과 싸우러 갈 때에 먼저 앉아 일만 명으로써 저 이만 명을 거느리고 오는 자를 대적할 수 있을까 헤아리지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: going out to encounter another king in war
and deliberate whether he is able
sentences.korean_translation: 자신이 할 수 있는지 생각하지 않겠��니까

sentences.original_text: with ten thousand to meet him
sentences.korean_translation: 만 명으로 그를 만날 수 있는지

sentences.original_text: who comes against him with twenty thousand
